mapper.select: SELECT q.*, qo.id as qo_id, qo.quest_id as qo_quest_id, qo.person_id as qo_person_id, qo.state as qo_state FROM quest q LEFT JOIN quest_order qo ON q.id = qo.quest_id WHERE q.world_id = #{worldId} AND (qo.state = #{state} OR qo.state IS NULL) ORDER BY q.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quest (world_id, type, name, place, difficulty, processed_date) VALUES (#{worldId}, #{quest.type}, #{quest.name}, #{quest.place}, #{quest.difficulty}, #{quest.processedDate})
